verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> And he came אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said לוֹ֙ שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> unto him There were two אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> men הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city אֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> in one אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> the one עָשִׁ֖יר <S%H6223><s%> rich וְאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and the other רָֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7326><s%> poor
לְעָשִׁ֗יר <S%H6223><s%> The rich הָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> had צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> flocks וּבָקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> and herds הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> many מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [man] had exceeding

וְלָרָ֣שׁ <S%H7326><s%> But the poor אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo כִּבְשָׂ֨ה <S%H3535><s%> ewe lamb אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> [man] had nothing save one קְטַנָּה֙ <S%H6996><s%> little אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Which קָנָ֔ה <S%H7069><s%> which he had bought וַיְחַיֶּ֕הָ <S%H2421><s%> and nourished up וַתִּגְדַּ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> and it grew up עִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> with him and with his children יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together מִפִּתּ֨וֹ <S%H6595><s%> of his own meat תֹאכַ֜ל <S%H398><s%> it did eat וּמִכֹּס֤וֹ <S%H3563><s%> of his own cup תִשְׁתֶּה֙ <S%H8354><s%> and drank וּבְחֵיק֣וֹ <S%H2436><s%> in his bosom תִשְׁכָּ֔ב <S%H7901><s%> and lay וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ל֖וֹ כְּבַֽת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and was unto him as a daughter

וַיָּ֣בֹא <S%H935><s%> And there came הֵלֶךְ֮ <S%H1982><s%> a traveller לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הֶֽעָשִׁיר֒ <S%H6223><s%> unto the rich וַיַּחְמֹ֗ל <S%H2550><s%> and he spared לָקַ֤חַת <S%H3947><s%> to take מִצֹּאנוֹ֙ <S%H6629><s%> of his own flock וּמִבְּקָר֔וֹ <S%H1241><s%> and of his own herd לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to dress לָאֹרֵ֖חַ <S%H732><s%> for the wayfaring man הַבָּא־ <S%H935><s%> that was come ל֑וֹ וַיִּקַּ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> unto him but took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כִּבְשַׂת֙ <S%H3535><s%> lamb הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man's הָרָ֔אשׁ <S%H7326><s%> the poor וַֽיַּעֲשֶׂ֔הָ <S%H6213><s%> and dressed לָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> it for the man הַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> that was come אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> anger דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David's בָּאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against the man מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> was greatly וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָתָ֔ן <S%H5416><s%> to Nathan חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> surely בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> this [thing] shall surely מָ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> die הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that hath done זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּבְשָׂ֖ה <S%H3535><s%> the lamb יְשַׁלֵּ֣ם <S%H7999><s%> And he shall restore אַרְבַּעְתָּ֑יִם <S%H706><s%> fourfold עֵ֗קֶב <S%H6118><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and because עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> he did אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no חָמָֽל׃ <S%H2550><s%> he had no pity

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נָתָ֛ן <S%H5416><s%> And Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> to David אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Thou [art] the man כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> is I מְשַׁחְתִּ֤יךָֽ <S%H4886><s%> I anointed לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> thee king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וְאָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> and I הִצַּלְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5337><s%> and I delivered מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> thee out of the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul

וָאֶתְּנָ֨ה <S%H5414><s%> And I gave לְךָ֜ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲדֹנֶ֗יךָ <S%H113><s%> thee thy master's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְשֵׁ֤י <S%H802><s%> wives אֲדֹנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H113><s%> and thy master's בְּחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2436><s%> into thy bosom וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> and gave לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> thee the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> and of Judah וְאִ֨ם־ <S%H518><s%> and if מְעָ֔ט <S%H4592><s%> and if [that had been] too little וְאֹסִ֥פָה <S%H3254><s%> I would moreover have given לְּךָ֖ כָּהֵ֥נָּה <S%H2007><s%> unto thee such וְכָהֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> and such things

מַדּ֜וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why בָּזִ֣יתָ ׀ <S%H959><s%> Wherefore hast thou despised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> the commandment יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do הָרַע֮ <S%H7451><s%> evil [בְּעֵינֹו כ] (בְּעֵינַי֒ <S%H5869><s%> affliction ק) אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אוּרִיָּ֤ה <S%H223><s%> Uriah הַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite הִכִּ֣יתָ <S%H5221><s%> down בַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife לָקַ֥חְתָּ <S%H3947><s%> and hast taken לְּךָ֖ לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> [to be] thy wife וְאֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> הָרַ֔גְתָּ <S%H2026><s%> and hast slain בְּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> him with the sword בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תָס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> depart חֶ֛רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Now therefore the sword מִבֵּיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> from thine house עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> alway עֵ֚קֶב <S%H6118><s%> because כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בְזִתָ֔נִי <S%H959><s%> thou hast despised וַתִּקַּ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> me and hast taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H802><s%> the wife אוּרִיָּ֣ה <S%H223><s%> of Uriah הַחִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֖ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to be thy wife ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> Behold I will raise up עָלֶ֤יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil מִבֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> against thee out of thine own house וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <S%H3947><s%> and I will take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָשֶׁ֙יךָ֙ <S%H802><s%> thy wives לְעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> before thine eyes וְנָתַתִּ֖י <S%H5414><s%> and give לְרֵעֶ֑יךָ <S%H7453><s%> [them] unto thy neighbour וְשָׁכַב֙ <S%H7901><s%> and he shall lie עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נָשֶׁ֔יךָ <S%H802><s%> with thy wives לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of this sun הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> For thou didst בַסָּ֑תֶר <S%H5643><s%> [it] secretly וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I אֶעֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> but I will do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> before all Israel וְנֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> and under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> and before the sun ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָתָ֔ן <S%H5416><s%> unto Nathan חָטָ֖אתִי <S%H2398><s%> I have sinned לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נָתָ֜ן <S%H5416><s%> And Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD הֶעֱבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> also hath put away חַטָּאתְךָ֖ <S%H2403><s%> thy sin לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> thou shalt not die

אֶ֗פֶס <S%H657><s%> Howbeit כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because נִאֵ֤ץ <S%H5006><s%> great occasion נִאַ֙צְתָּ֙ <S%H5006><s%> to blaspheme אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבֵ֣י <S%H341><s%> to the enemies יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> because by this deed הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this גַּ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> also הַבֵּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> the child הַיִּלּ֥וֹד <S%H3209><s%> also [that is] born לְךָ֖ מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> unto thee shall surely יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> die

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> And Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> unto his house וַיִּגֹּ֣ף <S%H5062><s%> struck יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֶּ֜לֶד <S%H3206><s%> the child אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יָלְדָ֧ה <S%H3205><s%> bare אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife אוּרִיָּ֛ה <S%H223><s%> that Uriah's לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David וַיֵּאָנַֽשׁ׃ <S%H605><s%> and it was very sick

וַיְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> therefore besought דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> for הַנָּ֑עַר <S%H5288><s%> for the child וַיָּ֤צָם <S%H6684><s%> fast דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> and David צ֔וֹם <S%H6685><s%> fast וּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> and went in וְלָ֖ן <S%H3885><s%> all night וְשָׁכַ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> and lay אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

וַיָּקֻ֜מוּ <S%H6965><s%> arose זִקְנֵ֤י <S%H2205><s%> And the elders בֵיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> of his house עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> beside לַהֲקִימ֖וֹ <S%H6965><s%> [and went] to him to raise him up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֔ה <S%H14><s%> but he would וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not בָרָ֥א <S%H1254><s%> choose אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> happened בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> And it came to pass on the seventh וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died הַיָּ֑לֶד <S%H3206><s%> that the child וַיִּֽרְאוּ֩ <S%H3372><s%> feared עַבְדֵ֨י <S%H5650><s%> And the servants דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> of David לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> to tell ל֣וֹ ׀ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead הַיֶּ֗לֶד <S%H3206><s%> him that the child כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> for they said הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בִהְי֨וֹת <S%H1961><s%> happened הַיֶּ֜לֶד <S%H3206><s%> Behold while the child חַ֗י <S%H2416><s%> was yet alive דִּבַּ֤רְנוּ <S%H1696><s%> we spake אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> unto him and he would not hearken בְּקוֹלֵ֔נוּ <S%H6963><s%> unto our voice וְאֵ֨יךְ <S%H349><s%> How נֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> if we tell אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about מֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> is dead הַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> him that the child וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> himself רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> vex

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> But when David כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> that עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> that his servants מִֽתְלַחֲשִׁ֔ים <S%H3907><s%> whispered וַיָּ֥בֶן <S%H995><s%> perceived דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead הַיָּ֑לֶד <S%H3206><s%> that the child וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֧ד <S%H1732><s%> therefore David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עֲבָדָ֛יו <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants הֲמֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> dead הַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> Is the child וַיֹּ֥אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> ?
